name: Nova Bolt
description: If this rolls any Crits, may target an additional Enemy Close to the target

name: Life Drain
description: Each hit heals 1 Wound from this Hero

name: Bleeder
description: Each Crit deals one addictional hit

name: Orc Beater
description: Rolls +1 die against Orcs and Goblins.

name: Wind Blast
description: If this rolls any hits, move the target up to 3 spaces (this Move doesn't trigger Guard Reaction).

name: Moon Ring
description: +1 die to one Attack Card

name: Orc Pelt
description: Limit 1 armor per Hero.

name: Grrrrrrrrr!
description: Once per attack, you may take 1 Wound to add +1 die.

name: Cleave
description: Your Sword and Axe attacks may target an additiobal Enemy Close to this Hero

name: Das Boot
description: When you activate a different hero, you may move this Hero 1 Space.

name: Smashface
description: If this deals any Wounds, your target is Dazed.

name: Quickshot
description: Only Crit on the Defense roll score saves against this attack.

name: Life Drain II
description: Each hit heals 1 Wound from this Hero and one Close Ally.

name: Decimator
description: Each Crit deals one additional hit.

name: Hate
description: If this rolls any Crit against a Hero, exhaust all of his cards, unless he takes 2 extra Wounds.

name: Knight's Plate
description: Limit 1 armor per Hero.

name: Knight's Shield
description: May exhaust your Hero card to force an attack made against you to be rolled again

name: Amulet of Retribution
description: Each hit cancelled by this Hero's Defense roll deals 1 Wound to the attacker.

name: Blazing Shot
description: +2 dice to a Bow attack. This Hero takes 1 Wound.

name: Cloak of Displacement
description: At the start of your turn, you may switch places between this Hero and an Ally (drop all Quest tokens).

name: Celerity Stick
description: This Hero may take 1 Wound to unexhaust all of his cards.

name: Crushing Guantlet
description: +2 dice to a non-Magic Melee attack. This Hero takes 1 Wound.

name: Crack of Dawn
description: Rolls +1 die against Heroes.

name: Brimstone
description: If this deals any Wounds, your target and 1 additional Enemy Close to it are Dazed.

name: Da Bomb
description: Limit 1 Bomb per Guild. If this rolls any hits, place 1 Guild token on each Close Space. Token explodes and attacks an enemy Hero who moves into that Space.

name: Nova Bolt II
description: If this rolls any Crits, may target an additional Enemy Close to the target

name: Astral Strike
description: Only targets any Enemy on the board that's Close to an Ally of yours.  (May be used by a dead Hero.  Does not trigger Payback Reaction.)

name: Wind Blast II
description: If this rolls any hits, move the target up to 3 spaces (this Move doesn't trigger Guard Reaction).

name: Die Booten
description: When you activate a different hero, you may move this Hero 2 Spaces.

name: More Grrrrrrrrr!
description: Once per attack, you may take 2 Wounds to add +2 die.

name: Genesis Glass
description: At the start of your turn, this Hero heals 1 Wound.

name: Lord's Plate
description: Limit 1 armor per Hero.

name: Battle Cry
description: If your attack rolls any Crit, you may activate another allied Hero this turn.

name: Wand of Hate
description: +1 die to a Magic attack. Do not exhaust the boosted Magic attack card.

name: Frostbite
description: +2 dice against Heroes with any exhausted cards

name: Twinbolt
description: Only Crit on the Defense roll score saves against this attack

name: Burninate
description: May also target any number of enemies Close to the target.

name: Bloodthirst
description: Each Crit deals 2 additional hits.

name: Hate II
description: If this rolls any Crit against a Hero, exhaust all of his cards, unless he takes 2 extra Wounds.

name: Death Swarm
description: If this rolls any Crit, take 2 monsters from the Spawn tile and place them anywhere on the board.

name: King's Plate
description: Limit 1 armor per Hero.

name: Moon Ring II
description: +2 dice to one Attack card.

name: Life Drain III
description: Each hit heals 1 Wound from this Hero and all Close Allies.

name: King's Shield
description: May exhaust Hero to get +2 on a Defense unite.

name: Book of the Dead
description: When attacking, add +1 die per Death token in your Guild.

name: Lifestealer
description: Each Wound dealt by the boosted Magic attack heals 1 Wound from this Hero.

name: Cleave II
description: Your Sword and Axe attacks may target all Enemies Close to this Hero

name: Emberstrike
description: If this rolls any Crit, target cannot roll Defense.

name: Bomb Appetit
description: Limit 1 Bomb per Guild. If this rolls any hits, place 1 Guild token on each Close Space. Token explodes and attacks an enemy Hero who moves into that Space.

name: Ground Pounder
description: If this deals a Wound, your target and all Enemies Close to it are Dazed.

name: Astral Strike II
description: Only targets any Enemy on the board that's Close to an Ally of yours.  (May be used by a dead Hero.  Does not trigger Payback Reaction.)

name: Burninate II
description: May also target any number of enemies Close to the target.

name: Emperor's Plate
description: Limit 1 armor per Hero.

name: Moon Shield
description: Double your total Defense dice.

name: Last Stand
description: X= Total Wounds on this Hero.

name: Heart of the Dragon
description: Each Crit on this Hero's Defense roll adds one extra save.

name: Amulet of Rawr!
description: +2 dice on Attack rolls.

name: Soulseeker
description: Each Crit on a Bow attack deals one extra hit.

name: Apocalypse Crown
description: At the start of your activation, you may deal 1 Wound to any Close Enemies

name: Ragestone
description: When attacking, add +1 die for each Wound on this Hero.

name: Moon Ring III
description: +3 dice to one Attack card.

name: Genesis Glass II
description: At the start of your turn, this Hero heals 2 Wounds.

name: Skullcracker
description: If this deals a Wound, your target and all Enemies is Dazed. +1 against Heroes.

name: Greenskin Bane
description: +1 die against Orcs and Goblins.

name: Heart of Angelis
description: Whenever this Hero suffers any Wounds, heal 1 Wound from all Allies.

name: Beastman's Spear
description: For this attack, the first diagonal Space counts as being Close.

name: Sack O' Bones
description: Heal 2 Wounds whenever this Hero kills an Enemy.

name: Shmetterling's Axe
description: Each Crit deals one additional hit and heals 1 Wound from this Hero.

name: Blood Crown
description: Deal 2 Wounds to an Enemy that leaves a Space Close to this Hero (limit once per Enemy per turn).

name: Tome of Enlightenment
description: This Hero has 2 additional inventory slots for Magic Attack cards.

name: Assassin's Cloak
description: When this Hero moves, deal 1 Wound to each Close Enemy (limit 1 Wound per Enemy per turn).

name: Bomb
description: Limit 1 Bomb per Guild. If this rolls any hits, place 1 Guild token on each Close Space. Token explodes and attacks an enemy Hero who moves into that Space.

name: Shield of Souls
description: Exhaust this Hero to immediately Ressurect one Ally.
